data.actual_result: Long username will be cut off.
data.expected_result: Long username should be truncated with "...".
data.short_description: Long username cut off for welcome message after creating account
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Discord website - Create an account by clicking on `Open Discord in your browser` - Enter a long username like `WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW` - Observe the welcome message after creating the account
